meanings.definition: A hormone and neurotransmitter that is released by the adrenal medulla and by the sympathetic nerves and functions as a neurotransmitter.
meanings.sent1: Noradrenalin helps transmit signals in the brain.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the effects of noradrenalin on the body.
meanings.sent3: The noradrenalin in my brain must be working overtime today!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a surge of noradrenalin.
meanings.sent5: The importance of noradrenalin in our nervous system cannot be overstated.
